description: The initiative focuses on agroecological farming through the Cooperativa Trabajadores de la Tierra in RÃ­o Colorado. They cultivate seasonal vegetables without agrochemicals, emphasizing sustainability and community involvement. The cooperative operates a weekly market, the Nehuen fair, where they sell fresh produce. Their goal is to expand their operations and encourage others to pursue similar sustainable practices, highlighting the benefits of homegrown remedies and organic farming.
name: Cooperativa de Trabajadores de la Tierra
